QuestData.Title: Sealed Vial of Poison
QuestData.Description: This vial of poison looks particularly dangerous. Perhaps someone in Dalaran might be interested in it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Sealed Vial of Poison to Alchemist Cinesra in the Dalaran Sewers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is that what I think it is, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: You are brave to have carried this. If even one drop were to touch your skin, you'd have died an agonizing death.$b$bAllow me to pay you for it... I can always use venom of exceptional potency.
